name: match-errors
description: Quickly match errors to the appropriate error handler. No more if/switch/else/case messes.

scripts.typecheck: npx -p typescript tsc --rootDir . src/test.js --allowJs --checkJs --noEmit --lib es6 --jsx react && echo 'TypeScript check complete.'
scripts.test: npm run -s unit && npm run -s lint
scripts.watch: watch 'clear && npm run -s unit && npm run -s lint' src
scripts.show-coverage-text: nyc report --reporter=text || echo "Run 'npm run test-coverage' first."
scripts.show-coverage-html: open coverage/index.html || echo "Run 'npm run test-coverage' first."
scripts.watch: watch 'clear && npm run -s unit | tap-nirvana && npm run -s lint' src
